updates.title: v0.1 – Button Playground
items: Created the very first layout using simple buttons for tables.
Each button could change color, but there was no real logic behind it.
Used this version mainly to test the idea of a visual seating map.

updates.title: v0.2 – Basic Status Toggling
items: Added a simple open/occupied toggle when tapping a table button.
Started experimenting with using green for open and red for occupied.
No counters or list mode existed yet, just raw interaction testing.

updates.title: v0.4 – Seat Labels & Table Names
items: Gave each table a name/number so it was easier to talk about them.
Added seat counts to help imagine real restaurant capacity.
Organized tables into rough groups: booths, indoor, and patio.

updates.title: v0.6 – Early Counter Experiments
items: Started experimenting with manual counters for open vs occupied tables.
Counters did not always match the table colors but helped shape the final idea.
Showed how useful it was to see capacity at a glance.

updates.title: v0.9 – Pre v1.0 Polish
items: Cleaned up button placement and spacing on the floor map.
Tweaked colors to improve contrast on darker backgrounds.
Prepared the layout that would become the official v1.0 prototype.
